Name: Ptah-Sokar-Osiris statuette
Description: Wooden statuette of a mummiform Ptah-Sokar-Osiris. On top of the blue striated wig is a feathered crown with sun disc. The chest is covered by a brightly striped collar with multiple rows. The body is red. The two vertical columns of text on the front and the back contain a prayer to Osiris. The lid of the high base is missing.
